price: 122. Después, su Señor lo escogió, aceptó su arrepentimiento y lo guio.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
